attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are, the celtic people, are tired of living under the Tyranny of the Queen and her goverment, we want to be free like we once were. We Want a Free Scotland, a Free Wales and a United Ireland, and wont stop until we have it!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
